name: WeeklyComics
0:
”Alexa, ask Weekly Comics What Marvel comics are out this week”
”Alexa, Open weekly comics”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weekly comics
des: This skill will let you see what comic books came out for dark horse,dc,idw,image or marvel for the current week. It will also let you see more information about the comics creators and price. Users on Echo shows will have the ability to see the covers of each comic book.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
